A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As someone who grew up watchingStar Wars movies and obsessing over the plot\, I'm never seeing another of these movies. They should've stopped at 6 and prevented Disney and JJ Abrams from ruining these movies forever. The plot was absolutely horrid and random and felt like the ultimate goal was just to surprise Star Wars fans. I'm glad this movie is deservedly getting bad reviews from real Star Wars fans
